title: Heavy Crossbows
content:
Heavy Crossbows have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Heavy Crossbows in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Piercing Shot and Brace (Ranged).
